title: Explainable Survival: From Prediction to Trust in Hex
one_liner: Local modeling, error analysis, and explainability work supporting an interactive, explainable ML app built in Hex.
problem: Just predicting survival on the Titanic dataset doesn't generate explainable results.
approach: This project reframes the classic Titanic survival prediction problem as a trust, error analysis, and interpretability challenge...
tradeoffs: This project was not about producing a Titanic leaderboard 'winner'...

title: The House of Westmarch: A Multi-Agent Concierge Estate of Dubious Decorum
one_liner: A quartet of aristocratic companions who attend to your affairs—planning, inquiry, drafting, critique—with charm and dignified commotion.
problem: Making agents remember details from previous interactions is challenging.
approach: This project defines a set of four distinct agents, each with their own personality and expertise...
tradeoffs: Interactions are meant to be light-hearted and entertaining rather than strictly utilitarian...
